Vestal Shopping Shuttle

Description:

The VS Shuttle leaves campus and travels to Target and Walmart, while also making stops at Bunn Hill Road & Vestal Parkway, Riviera Ridge, Hollybrook, Burris Rd & Rano Blvd, Parkway Plaza, Town Square Mall, The Shoppes at Vestal, and Campus Plaza enroute back to campus.

Operation Time:

Weekdays:
The VS Shuttle runs at 12:00 P.M. on Weekdays until 9:00 P.M.

Before 12:00 P.M., please use the BC Transit Route 47 or BC Transit Route 57 for service to/from Riviera Ridge, Hollybrook, Target, Walmart, and Binghamton University.


Weekends:
The VS Shuttle runs starting at 10:00 A.M. until 9:15 P.M.

Notes:

Scroll below for a graphic map of this route, its schedule, and its stops with links to stop pictures and Google Maps location pins so that you can easily find your stop, and know when your bus is expected to arrive.
